amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section setting forth guidelines for accountability and transparency for grant recipients.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Frank (MA).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
